actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to allocate conservation storage at Greers Ferry Lake Project.

summary.text: Directs the Chief of Engineers to allocate, at no cost to the city of Heber Springs, Arkansas, a specified amount of conservation storage for water supply from the existing Greers Ferry Lake project on the Little Red River in the White River Basin, Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to allocate conservation storage at Greers Ferry Lake Project.
